title: How to Fold a Pack and Play

steps.title: Remove the mattress from the Pack ‘n Play.
steps.content: Remove the mattress from the Pack ‘n Play. Release the straps securing the mattress to the bottom of the Pack ‘n Play or bassinet attachment. Pull the mattress up out of the playard and set it aside. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Pull up on the center of the playard floor.
steps.content: Pull up on the center of the playard floor. Most models have a red strap located at the center of the playard floor. Grasp the strap and pull it up to begin the process of collapsing the playard. [4] X Research source Some models have a handle instead of a strap on the floor of the playard. Grab the handle, push it down, and turn it to release the center of the playard floor, then pull up. If you have a model that can be folded with the bassinet in place, such as the On the Go, pull apart the bassinet’s metal support tubes first. Reach through the slit in the center of the bassinet’s mesh base to grab the strap. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Lift one of the top rails up slightly.
steps.content: Lift one of the top rails up slightly. After you pull up the floor of the playard, grasp one of the 4 top rails at the center, where the release button is located. Pull up on the rail slightly. [6] X Research source Pulling up on the rail a little will help disengage the tubes on either side of the release button. You need to do this before or at the same time as you push the button, depending on the model. [7] X Research source You won’t be able to lift or release the rails until the playard floor is lifted.

steps.title: Press the button in the center of the rail to unlock it.
steps.content: Press the button in the center of the rail to unlock it. While the side rail is slightly lifted, find the release button on the side of the rail and push it in. This button is located at the center of the rail on its outer side. [8] X Research source You’ll need to press fairly hard on the button to unlock the rail. [9] X Research source On some models, the button is located underneath the rail.

steps.title: Push the rail down to collapse it.
steps.content: Push the rail down to collapse it. Keep the button pushed in and push down on the middle of the rail. The metal tubes on either side of the section with the button should both disengage, allowing the rail to fold downward. [10] X Research source If the rail doesn’t fold, don’t try to force it. Try lifting the floor higher to allow the rails to fold properly.

steps.title: Repeat this process on the other 3 top rails.
steps.content: Repeat this process on the other 3 top rails. After you’ve successfully folded the first rail, unlock the other 3 and fold them down in the same way. [11] X Research source Double check all the rails to make sure they’re completely collapsed, with the tubes on either side of each center section disengaged.

steps.title: Bring the collapsed rails together.
steps.content: Bring the collapsed rails together. Finish by making sure the floor is pulled all the way up and pushing all the collapsed rails together. Your Pack ‘n Play should fold up into a neat, compact bundle. [12] X Research source If the Pack ‘n Play doesn’t collapse completely, check to make sure none of the rails are partially locked. If you find a rail that isn’t completely collapsed, push the center button again to release the lock.

steps.title: Place the playard and any accessories on the mattress.
steps.content: Place the playard and any accessories on the mattress. After you collapse the playard, set it on the mattress. Bundle up any accessories that you’d like to pack with it, such as your mattress sheet, bassinet base and support tubes, and toy bar, next to the folded playard on top of the mattress. [13] X Research source Make sure the mattress is facing up when you place these items on top of it.

steps.title: Wrap the Pack ‘n Play and any accessories in the mattress.
steps.content: Wrap the Pack ‘n Play and any accessories in the mattress. Fold the mattress pad at each of the 4 creases so that it completely surrounds the Pack ‘n Play. The bottom of the mattress should be facing out. [14] X Research source Take care to tuck in any accessories so that they fit neatly inside the bundle.

steps.title: Thread the hook-and-loop fastener straps through the loops to secure the mattress.
steps.content: Thread the hook-and-loop fastener straps through the loops to secure the mattress. Grab one of the straps along the edge of the mattress bottom and find the corresponding loop on the opposite edge. Thread the strap through the loop, pull it tight, and fold it back on itself to fasten it. Repeat this process with the other strap. [15] X Research source

steps.title: Slide the bundled Pack ‘n Play into its bag with the handle up.
steps.content: Slide the bundled Pack ‘n Play into its bag with the handle up. After you secure the Pack ‘n Play inside its mattress, turn it so that the handle on the outside of the mattress is facing up. Take the travel bag and position it so you can line up the handle with the slot in the top of the bag. Slide the bag over the Pack ‘n Play and zip it shut with the handle sticking out. [17] X Research source To guide the Pack ‘n Play into the bag more easily, make sure to align the corners of the bag with the corners of the mattress.
